node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter[
node_info.description: Helper for working with lists of items and transforming arrays
node_info.name: itemLists

properties.name: maxItems
properties.description: If there are more items than this number, some are removed

properties.name: keep
properties.description: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending

properties.name: compare
properties.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same

properties.name: fieldsToExclude
properties.description: Fields in the input to exclude from the comparison

properties.name: fieldsToCompare
properties.description: Fields in the input to add to the comparison

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to remove any fields that are not being compared. If disabled, will keep the values from the first of the duplicates.

options.name: removeOtherFields
options.description: Whether to remove any fields that are not being compared. If disabled, will keep the values from the first of the duplicates.

options.name: All Item Data (Into a Single List)
options.displayName: All Item Data (into A Single List)

properties.name: fieldsToAggregate
properties.description: The name of a field in the input items to aggregate together
properties.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: fieldToAggregate
values.description: The name of a field in the input items to aggregate together
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: renameField
values.description: Whether to give the field a different name in the output

values.name: outputFieldName
values.description: The name of the field to put the aggregated data in. Leave blank to use the input field name.

properties.name: destinationFieldName
properties.description: The name of the output field to put the data in

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to merge the output into a single flat list (rather than a list of lists), if the field to aggregate is a list

options.name: mergeLists
options.description: Whether to merge the output into a single flat list (rather than a list of lists), if the field to aggregate is a list

options.name: includeBinaries
options.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new item

options.name: keepOnlyUnique
options.description: Whether to keep only unique binaries by comparing mime types, file types, file sizes and file extensions

options.name: keepMissing
options.description: Whether to add a null entry to the aggregated list when there is a missing or null value

properties.name: disableDotNotation
properties.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Combine fields into a list in a single new item

options.name: Concatenate Items
options.description: Combine fields into a list in a single new item

options.name: Limit
options.description: Remove items if there are too many

options.name: Remove Duplicates
options.description: Remove extra items that are similar

options.name: Split Out Items
options.description: Turn a list or values of object's properties inside item(s) into separate items

properties.name: type
properties.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same

properties.name: sortFieldsUi
properties.description: The field to sort by
properties.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: fieldName
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

properties.name: code
properties.description: Javascript code to determine the order of any two items

properties.name: fieldToSplitOut
properties.description: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.
properties.placeholder: Drag fields from the left or type their names

properties.name: include
properties.description: Whether to copy any other fields into the new items

properties.name: fieldsToInclude
properties.description: Fields in the input items to aggregate together

properties.name: options
properties.description: The field in the output under which to put the split field contents

options.name: destinationFieldName
options.description: The field in the output under which to put the split field contents

options.name: includeBinary
options.description: Whether to include the binary data in the new items

properties.name: fieldsToSummarize
properties.description: How to combine the values of the field you want to summarize
properties.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: aggregation
values.description: How to combine the values of the field you want to summarize

values.name: field
values.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: field
values.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize. The field should contain numerical values; null, undefined, empty strings would be ignored.
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: field
values.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize; null, undefined, empty strings would be ignored

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
